short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Attempt to Revert Facebook to the Old Layout (pre-Sep 2020)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Forced into the new Facebook layout? Don't like it?
This extension tries to make the new Facebook use the old Facebook colors, before the September 2020 update.
